problems.title: Sound Familiar?
scenarios: Stuck on a complex architecture decision for days?
Code review backlog blocking your entire team?
Need someone to sanity-check your approach?
Deadline approaching but unsure if you're on the right track?

services.example: Sarah saved 3 weeks by catching a scalability issue early

services.title: Code Reviews

steps.title: Get Unstuck Fast
steps.description: Screen sharing, code review, or workspace collaboration

trust.title: Why Builders Trust Our Professional Advisors

points.title: Quality Guarantee
points.description: Not satisfied? First session is free

items.question: What if I can't explain my problem clearly?
items.answer: Our advisors are skilled at understanding technical challenges. They'll ask the right questions to help clarify your situation and provide targeted guidance.

items.question: How do I know the advisor is qualified?
items.answer: All our advisors pass technical interviews and have proven industry experience. You can see their backgrounds, specializations, and reviews before booking.

items.question: What if we don't finish in the allotted time?
items.answer: Sessions can be extended if both parties agree, or you can book a follow-up session. We're flexible to ensure you get the help you need.

items.question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with your session, contact our support team within 24 hours for a full refund.

finalCta.title: Ready to Stop Being Stuck?
finalCta.subtitle: Join 5,000+ developers who get unstuck faster

recruitment.text: Are you a senior engineer who loves helping other developers?

challengeSelection.title: What's your main challenge?

architecture.title: System Architecture Decision
architecture.description: Need guidance on designing scalable systems, choosing the right architecture patterns, or refactoring existing code

performance.title: Performance Issues
performance.description: Application is slow, memory leaks, database queries taking too long, or need optimization guidance

debugging.title: Complex Bug Investigation
debugging.description: Stuck on a tricky bug, intermittent issues, or need help with debugging strategies and tools

code-review.title: Code Review & Best Practices
code-review.description: Want expert feedback on code quality, design patterns, security, or team development practices

technology.title: Technology Selection
technology.description: Choosing between frameworks, databases, cloud providers, or other technology stack decisions

career.title: Career & Technical Growth

challengeDetails.subtitle: Tell us more about your specific situation

policies.title: Booking Policies
policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before consultation
policies.ownership: You own all code and assets produced during consultation
policies.refund: Refunds are automatic for cancellations more than 24 hours in advance

notes.label: Consultation Notes (Optional)
notes.placeholder: What would you like to discuss or get help with?
notes.help: Help your advisor prepare by sharing details about your project or questions

project.label: Related Project (Optional)
project.help: Link this consultation to one of your SheenApps projects

confirmation.title: Consultation Booked!
confirmation.email: You'll receive a confirmation email with all the details

cancel.title: Cancel Consultation
cancel.refundInfo: Cancelled more than 24 hours in advance? You'll receive a full refund automatically.
cancel.noRefundInfo: Cancelled within 24 hours? No refund will be issued per our policy.

success.title: Consultation Cancelled
success.withRefund: Your consultation has been cancelled and a full refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
success.noRefund: Your consultation has been cancelled. No refund will be issued as per our 24-hour policy.

rating.label: Overall Rating
rating.help: How would you rate this consultation overall?

comment.label: Review (Optional)
comment.placeholder: Share your experience to help other clients...
comment.help: Your review will be public and help other clients choose advisors

success.title: Review Submitted!
success.description: Thank you for your feedback. Your review helps other clients find great advisors.
